'''Sandstorm in the Desert of Hadramaveth''' is a [[climate]] that appears in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].

==Overview==
Most of the Desert of Hadramaveth is affected by constant sandstorms, which limit the player's visibility. The closer the player is to the center of the Desert of Hadramaveth, the worse the sandstorms are.

{{Tutorial|Sandstorm in the Desert of Hadramaveth...}}

==Description==
{{Description|'''Sandstorm in the Desert of Hadramaveth...'''
* Sandstorms occur intermittently in this region. Visibility is sharply reduced within these sandstorms...}}
